name: Add Google Sheets rows for new affiliates in Tapfiliate
description:
Every time a new affiliate appears in your Tapfiliate, Make will add a row with information on them.
Make sure your sheet has got the same fields as this (one)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pdGqo0GrGwR4gV32x-bgRdK4IR_PHaI40Irdo3UOUG8/edit?usp=sharing].
